tool.name: SAGA.ta_hydrology.24
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayDISTANCE False isArrayTWI False output_data_TCILOW $output_data_TCILOW name SAGA.ta_hydrology.24 DISTANCE $DISTANCE TWI $TWI prefer $prefer response $response outputType_TCILOW $OutputSection_TCILOW.outputType_TCILOW transmissionMode_TCILOW $OutputSection_TCILOW.transmissionMode_TCILOW

param.name: DISTANCE
param.label: Vertical Distance to Channel Network
param.help: Vertical Distance to Channel Network The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff, png, x-ogc-envi

param.name: TWI
param.label: Topographic Wetness Index
param.help: Topographic Wetness Index The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff, png, x-ogc-envi

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_TCILOW
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: Terrain Classification Index for Lowlands (TCI Low).
